summary: The inmates of an insane asylum take over the institution, imprison the doctors and staff, and then put into play their own ideas of how the place should be run.
cast: Claudio Brook|Arthur Hansel|Ellen Sherman|Martin LaSalle|David Silva|Mónica Serna|Max Kerlow|Susana Kamini|Pancho Córdova|Roberto Dumont|Henry West|Jorge Bekris|René Alís|Mario Castillón Bracho|Óscar Saro|Diane Shay|Virgílio Leos|Abraham Stavans|Victorio Blanco|Paloma Zozaya|Sofía Solorio|Julia Marichal|Ramón Barragán|Lya Engel|José Antonio Alcaraz|Nadine Markova|Javier Batiz|Macaria|Peter Jones|Kevin McCormick|Guillermo S. Maldonado|María Antonieta Domínguez|Emmanuel Oléa|Joan Mary|Antonio Zubiaga|Tita Arroyo|Fernando Rosales|René Barrera|Gerardo Zepeda|Vicente Lara|Juan Garza|Beatriz Velo|León Singer|Simon Alkon|Sammy Viskin|Germán Castro|Miguel Ángel Santamaría|Roberto Hernández|Alexis Arroyo|Nurit Viskin
title: La mansión de la locura
